attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Fireworks. They look awesome, they sound awesome, that is, if you go to a proper one! The fireworks, that you can buy down the shops, and that you set up in your garden, are rubbish and a waste of money. Not to mention DANGEROUS! On countless occasions have many people been badly and even critically injured at Home Firework Displays. Imagine you setting up a display at home, and one hitting your child in the face. Could you live with it? Plus, going to a fireworks display organised by your local council or a properly organised and licenced one, if much more fun. And because of the licence being owned, you can get much better fireworks, and it usually only costs abouth £5.00 per adult! So, sign this petition now, to stomp out injuries caused by fireworks.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
